urls.title: Water firms are main source of microplastics in UK rivers, study says
urls.description: Research says discharge of untreated sewage and wastewater during dry spells to blame

tweets.text:
Important new research out today by @Jamie_Woodward_ & others identifies water firms as the main source of microplastics in UK rivers. 

Builds more pressure on government @EnvAgency to tackle the way water firms release untreated effluent into our rivers.
https://t.co/HKK1Ar0abP

This #MentalHealthAwarenessWeek we‚Äôve been encouraging @envagency staff to get out and safely connect with #nature during their lunch break - whether that‚Äôs in their own garden, a local park, a forest or the countryside. https://t.co/nwdvg1p4ls

tweets.text:
#Mentalhealth is just as important as physical health. 

It‚Äôs OK to talk about your mental health and it‚Äôs OK not to be OK. 

If you‚Äôre suffering and you don‚Äôt know who to talk to @samaritans helpline is open around the clock on 116 123. 

Make sure you get the support you need. https://t.co/uSIAMp2Tl9

tweets.text: More agricultural muck stored against the rules, literally on top of a watercourse this time. Directly under the muck pile runs a drainage ditch that runs straight into the River Frome, which runs straight into the Lugg, which exceeds phosphate limits. @EnvAgency /1 https://t.co/IhAXZqe2gs
@ClareDinnisEA When are you going to demand that core samples are taken from this landfill? https://t.co/M6IcE4Lt2x
@JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency Must be nice to be able to do that Mr. Bevan, in an environment not plagued by the stench of a landfill like that I n Newcastle under Lyme.

@StinkStopthe @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency You don‚Äôt care about physical health or mental health‚Ä¶ The people of Newcastle under Lyme and Stoke on Trent are having their lives destroyed by your failure to regulate @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs on your watch, act now!!! #stopthestink https://t.co/3K8c2NJ3Ee

@fayedavies @StinkStopthe @DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids Agree. The identity of anything buried beneath requires a core sample being taken and tested. COVID and lockdown has been used to maximum effect by @RedIndustries2 we need to know exactly what has been deposited, especially over that period of time @EnvAgencyMids

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids If the EA were not there, what would have happened? Exactly what I knew was happening from the high H2S to CH4 ratio recorded on the MMF when I visited on 29th March: it would have gone into the heap.
@DrMickSalt @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids We need core samples drilled out and tested by independent means.

I‚Äôm exactly the same, my husband and mother in law (bubble) don‚Äôt believe me at first then 5 mins later everyone can smell it. Sometimes my throat / asthma starts before I notice the stench @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @MattHancock @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency https://t.co/CT0EFYNd24

tweets.text:
I took a photo today while standing at the tip gate, to show how close the tip and Millmoor Juniors Football Club is. I want to show the @EnvAgency because I seriously don't think they know. 
#StopDroppingwellTip #Rotherham https://t.co/re3xDm5Lmh
@StinkStopthe 7 stench incidents reported by email since Sunday and not one reference number received as yet. Shocking unprofessional set up @EnvAgencyMids

@JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency You should be holding your P45 on that photo, completely failed the people of Newcastle under Lyme. Can't decide if you  and Dinnis are totally incompetent  or are taking backhanders.
I dare you to come to Newcastle and smell for yourself.

Our officers have been out & about this weekend further to reports of odour from #WalleysQuarry #NewcastleUnderLyme 
 
We detected odour at numerous locations & last week issued the operator with further actions to improve its management of landfill gas as quickly as possible. https://t.co/zoXM4W2yrW

urls.title: Secretary of State appointed vacancies for the Environment Agency Boar
urls.description: Recently Government announced the Secretary of State, working closely with the Chair of the Environment Agency, is seeking to appoint three new members to the Board of the Environment Agency. Applications are encouraged by 2 June.

tweets.text: Do you have expertise in flood and coastal erosion risk management or land management? We're encouraging members to apply for the @EnvAgency's new board vacancies. Find out more here üëâ https://t.co/08Myf6dypR https://t.co/g15yaYNaVn

üåç We‚Äôve published the #FCERMStrategy Action Plan. 

It sets out the steps we‚Äôll take to create climate resilient places and to prepare our nation for the future.  

Read more: https://t.co/orMjcLMRuQ

#TogetherForOurPlanet #COP26 @The_WMA https://t.co/yeTB8Isl0C
@RobGMacfarlane @EnvAgency You can read the paper here https://t.co/lpKwRxYEQC
@JaneCahane @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Your link took me to an item on grief and an item on dance.

@JamesBevanEA Are you taking the mick, bringing up mental health whilst the EA refuse to stop those cowboys at Walleys Quarry destroying people's physical and mental health? 
@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

@fayedavies @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe It's terrible, & working in the same air is just so difficult, I smell it minutes before those who don't live n sink zone at work, triggers me straight away, mental & physical health got to be adversely effected, every night just gets worse. Surely this can't go on #stopthestink
@Warren_A_Smith @ClareNicklin @DrMickSalt @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids In that case why don't the EA sift through the records .

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock I hope they find the money for compensation for 20k + residents.  Or find the money to hire more people to deal with this catastrophe
